title: Jam and Jax NPC Index: Undead Templates
description: Add these spooky templates to any of the Jam and Jax NPCs or vanilla bestiary creatures to turn them into the Undead. Update to directions: Drag in the main template (i.e. Vampire Template) to autopopulate other feats based on creature level.
